name: DEC WPS Plus File
summary: Learn about .DX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DX files are very rare since the DEC WPS Plus program used to create them is no longer used, except for a few computer hobbyists. If you need to open a DX file, you can use a text editor.
NOTE: DEC WPS stands for Digital Equipment Corporation Word Processing System.

description: A DX file is a document created by DEC WPS Plus, a DOS word processing program. It contains a document saved in plain text. DX files can be opened by any text editor.
